## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                  | Type     | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `alignment` | `alignment` | Text alignment 'left' \| 'center' \| 'right' | `string` | `undefined` |
| `author`    | `author`    | Author                                       | `string` | `undefined` |
| `class`     | `class`     | Additional classes                           | `string` | `''`        |
| `link`      | `link`      | Link to the source                           | `string` | `''`        |
